content.raw: That would prevent us from putting plugins in other subdirectories.
content.html: That would prevent us from putting plugins in other subdirectories.

update.description:
The battery functionality is pretty simple.

This pull request also adds the ability to construct integration tests.
update.title: Added battery functionality, and test

content.raw: I don't think we need this line.
content.html: I don't think we need this line.

content.raw:
We could replace this line with:

`configure_file (test_config.h.in ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/test_config.h)`

and change the future `#include` to:


```
#!python

include "test/test_config.h"
```


This will remove this warning from the checker:

`./test/integration/battery.cc:20:  Include the directory when naming .h files  [build/include] [4]`
content.html:
We could replace this line with:

configure_file (test_config.h.in ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/test_config.h)

and change the future #include to:

include "test/test_config.h"

This will remove this warning from the checker:

./test/integration/battery.cc:20: Include the directory when naming .h files [build/include] [4]

content.raw: Just curiosity: Why do we need `swarm_empty.world`? Shouldn't be enough to use `empty.world`? Is it because you want to test with a specific `<ode>` tag or is your idea to load the broker plugin in the future?
content.html: Just curiosity: Why do we need swarm_empty.world? Shouldn't be enough to use empty.world? Is it because you want to test with a specific <ode> tag or is your idea to load the broker plugin in the future?

content.raw: Should we set the velocities to `0` if we run out of battery?
content.html: Should we set the velocities to 0 if we run out of battery?

content.raw:
I think this line should be:
`#define SWARM_PROJECT_TEST_PLUGIN_PATH "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/integration"`
content.html: I think this line should be: #define SWARM_PROJECT_TEST_PLUGIN_PATH "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/integration"

content.raw:
We could add a new "Introspection" category of functions in this block of documentation including a quick view of :

* Type()
* Name()
* All battery related functions.
content.html:
We could add a new "Introspection" category of functions in this block of documentation including a quick view of :

  • Type()
  • Name()
  • All battery related functions.

content.raw:
Few complains reported by the checker:

```
#!python
[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::startCapacity' is not initialized in the constructor.
[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::capacity' is not initialized in the constructor.
[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::consumption' is not initialized in the constructor.
[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::consumptionFactor' is not initialized in the constructor.
./test/integration/battery.cc:20:  Include the directory when naming .h files  [build/include] [4]
```
content.html:
Few complains reported by the checker:

[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::consumption' is not initialized in the constructor.
[src/RobotPlugin.cc:36]: (warning) Member variable 'RobotPlugin::consumptionFactor' is not initialized in the constructor.
./test/integration/battery.cc:20:  Include the directory when naming .h files  [build/include] [4]
